trans-unit.source:
Minds recommends

trans-unit.source: Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.
trans-unit.target: Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.

trans-unit.source: Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a “Daily Reward Pool”. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.
trans-unit.target: Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a “Daily Reward Pool”. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.

trans-unit.source: Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a “Contribution Score” which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.
trans-unit.target: Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a “Contribution Score” which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that with the new system, you will only receive credit for unique interaction, and you can only earn credit from another unique user once per metric per day. (If a friend votes on my content 100 times in a day, I will only get credit for 1 vote). This is critical in preventing gaming and abuse of the system as we move into more valuable token rewards. We are essentially measuring how many unique users you reached in a given day.
trans-unit.target: Es importante señalar que con el nuevo sistema sólo recibirá crédito por una interacción única, y sólo puedes ganar crédito de otro usuario único una vez por métrica al día. (Si un amigo vota 100 veces al día, sólo obtendré crédito por 1 voto). Esto es fundamental para prevenir el juego y el abuso del sistema a medida que avanzamos hacia las recompensas de fichas más valiosas. Básicamente estamos midiendo cuántos usuarios únicos ha alcanzado en un día determinado.

trans-unit.source: Daily rewards will be distributed at 02:00 am GMT everyday into your off-chain address.
trans-unit.target: Las recompensas diarias se distribuirán cada día a las 02:00 am GMT en su dirección fuera de la cadena.

trans-unit.source:
Pending Balance
The total amount of cash you are scheduled to receive from wires
and/or Pro earnings
. The payout date is an estimation and it may take up to 7 days before your cash reaches your bank account.
trans-unit.target:
Saldo pendiente
La cantidad total de efectivo que has programado para recibir de cables
y/o ganancias Pro
. La fecha de pago es estimada y puede tardar hasta 7 días antes de que tu dinero llegue a tu cuenta bancaria.

trans-unit.source:
Pro Earnings
At the end of each month, your Pro earnings will move into your pending balance if you've reached the $100 threshold. When this happens, your Pro earnings will be reset to zero. If you haven't reached the threshold, your earnings will rollover to the next month.
trans-unit.target:
Ganancias Pro
al final de cada mes, tus ganancias Pro pasarán a tu saldo pendiente si has alcanzado el umbral de $100. Cuando esto suceda, tus ganancias Pro se restablecerán a cero. Si no has alcanzado el umbral, tus ganancias se repondrán hasta el próximo mes.

trans-unit.source:
Our
research-based
approach in handling misinformation and other types of controversial lawful content is to facilitate civil discourse through free speech, which is the only way to change someone’s mind. It is your choice to engage with someone, keep scrolling, report or block.
trans-unit.target:
Nuestro enfoque
basado en investigación
acerca del manejo de desinformación y otros tipos de contenido legal pero polémico es facilitar el discurso civil a través de la libertad de expresión, la cual es la única manera de cambiar la forma de pensar de alguien. Es tu elección abordar a alguien, seguir avanzando, reportar o bloquear.
